name: 4PCS 4-1/2 Inch Diamond Saw Blades - Ceramic, Glass, Rock & Tile Cutting Disc for Angle Grinder, Industrial Strength Diamond Blade Set
short_description: COMPLETE 4-PC DIAMOND BLADE SET - This diamond saw blades set includes specialized blades for various materials. Features multi-hole cooling technology to reduce heat buildup and extend blade life. Perfect as a glass cutting disc for mirrors, tile cutting disc for bathrooms, and rock slab grinding disc for stone work.

HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION - Made with industrial-grade diamonds and reinforced steel core, these diamond blades maintain sharpness through tough materials. The durable design ensures clean cuts on porcelain, granite, and marble without warping or premature wear.

UNIVERSAL ANGLE GRINDER COMPATIBILITY - Designed as the perfect diamond blade for angle grinder, these 4-1/2 inch grinder blades fit most standard models. Easy to install and ideal for both professional contractors and DIY home improvement projects.

IDEAL FOR TILE & STONE APPLICATIONS - Achieve professional results with this versatile tile blade that prevents chipping and cracking. The tile cutter blade design works perfectly for kitchen backsplashes, bathroom floors, and outdoor stone installations.

VERSATILE CUTTING SOLUTION - This comprehensive diamond cutting disc collection handles everything from delicate glass cutting to heavy rock slab grinding. All blades are ready for immediate use and organized for convenient storage.
product_description: Make Every Cutting Project Simple and Worry-Free - 4-Piece Diamond Blade Set Whether you're renovating your home or handling everyday repairs, our diamond blade set delivers perfect cutting results every time. This 4-piece professional blade collection is designed specifically for homeowners and DIY enthusiasts, helping you achieve professional-quality results on any project. Why Choose Our Blade Set? Multiple Uses in One Box One set handles glass, tile, stone, and more. Cut bathroom tiles in the morning, work on kitchen countertops in the afternoon, and create glass art in the evening – no need to buy separate specialized blades. Save both time and money. Stays Sharp Cut After Cut Made with industrial-grade diamonds and reinforced steel cores, these blades deliver clean, precise cuts every time. As one customer shared: "After two years of use, they still cut my patio stones as smoothly as the first day – amazing quality!" Fits Common Angle Grinders The 4-1/2 inch size works with most household angle grinders. Like Mike from Ohio said: "I was worried about installation, but it took just 30 seconds to fit my old grinder. I started my patio project immediately!" No special skills required – just open the package and start creating. Whether you're a first-time DIYer or an experienced renovator, these blades will become your most trusted tool box companions.

name: Bosch GWX10-45PE 4-1/2 In. X-LOCK Ergonomic Angle Grinder with Lock-On Paddle Switch
short_description: ERGONOMIC, POWERFUL GRINDER DESIGN: Engineered with the x-lock mount, a narrow grip zone and light weight but with pro power
X-LOCK WHEEL CHANGE: Features snap-on mounting and grinder lever wheel release for change-out that's up to five times faster

EPOXY-COATED FIELD WINDINGS: Extend motor lifetime by preventing dust and debris from penetrating the motor windings

product_description: The Bosch GWX10-45PE 4-1/2 In. X-LOCK angle grinder features the X-LOCK mount, offering a wheel change interface that's up to five times faster than conventional interfaces. There’s an audible snap when mounting an X-LOCK Wheel on an X-LOCK grinder. The wheel mounts properly without the need for a spanner wrench or flange nuts. The wheel is released from the grinder with the pull of a lever. The grinder features a narrow grip zone. The GWX10-45PE ergonomic grinder features a narrow grip zone for extended comfort and control, combined with a powerful 10-amp motor. It delivers results, producing up to 11,000 no-load rpm for maximum productivity in grinding and cutting applications. The tool weighs 4.6 Lbs. It features a multi-grip lock-on paddle switch, which provides increased grip options for better ergonomics, comfort and control. Equipped with epoxy-coated field windings and direct-motor cooling, this grinder is built for a longer tool life. It features spiral bevel gears for smooth transmission of power. For added convenience, it has an auxiliary handle and an adjustable tool-free guard.

From the Manufacturer This powerful 7.5 AMP 4-1/2" angle grinder has an exclusive labyrinth construction that seals the motor and bearings from contamination. The 9557NB features a switch (AC/DC) that is conveniently located on the top of the motor housing; a small circumference barrel grip for easy handling, a high power-to-weight ratio and a double insulated motor. A spindle lock makes for easy wheel changes and the side handle can be installed on either side of tool. Kit includes grinding wheel, wrench, side handle, flange and wheel guard.
